response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. I understand its importance to you and I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value and reflects my desire to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 1200000}
